title: RBF Trust LLC (a Florida Limited Liability Company), Paulo Fernando De Bastos, Joao Pedro Fonseca, RBF Trust LLC (a Michigan Limited Liability Company), D3 Gestion Immobiliere LLC (a Michigan Limited Liability Company), and D3 Gestion Immobiliere LLC (a Florida Limited Liability Company)
description: SEC Charges South Florida Man and Others with Real Estate Investment Fraud
